title: Tearful Bianca Gascoigne reveals she's been unable to sleep after Jamie O'Hara dumped her... And hits back at being branded a 'cheat' in Loose Women chat
text:
TV Magazine Tearful chat Tearful Bianca Gascoigne reveals she’s been unable to sleep after Jamie O’Hara dumped her… And hits back at being branded a ‘cheat’ in Loose Women chat 
The TV star appeared on Friday's show to discuss her love life drama By JILL ROBINSON, SHOWBIZ REPORTER 17th February 2017, 1:02 pm
